title: AmblyoVison II
description:
AmblyoVision II is an application designed to enhance eye coordination in a fun way through various games and activities. To fully enjoy the experience, it is necessary to use anaglyph glasses with red-green filters, whose color is completely customizable.

The application can be a useful tool as part of supervised visual therapy by a specialist, especially for individuals with amblyopia (lazy eye) issues.

AmblyoVision II does not replace the diagnosis or medical treatment provided by a professional. It is crucial to always follow the recommendations given by the application, as we are not responsible for its misuse.

summary: Visual improvement through fun and games.
